name: Lipa Wizards: The Book
description:
Cornelia will do anything to win the wizard tournament--even hurt her friend’s feelings. This interactive book will take kids on a magic quest to help Cornelia learn the value of friendship!

• 29 amazingly animated screens;
• 3 play modes to tell the story;
• Interactive animations;
• Help Cornelia learn what it means to be a friend;
• Foster a love of reading.

Lipa Wizards is an educational app ideal for kids aged 5+.

Have you helped Cornelia become friends with Mr. Pumpkin? Discover other challenging and fun apps!

Enjoy voiceovers in your native language and even accent. Available in both British and American English, German, Spanish, Mexican Spanish, French, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Czech, Turkish, Polish, Arabic, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, Swedish, Dutch, Vietnamese, Hebrew, Korean, Malay, Indonesian and Ukrainian!

Crafted by Lipa Learning, a community of educators and creative professionals dedicated to revolutionizing childhood development.
